OmniAssessmentTask.name: OmniAssessmentTask
OmniAssessmentTask.description: Represents the information about an assessment task that is associated with an OmniScript.

AssessmentId.description: The assessment record associated with the runtime instance of an assessment task record. The value is null when the record is designed through action plan template and populated when the assessment is taken through associated omni process.

DefinitionReferenceId.description: The definition record associated with the runtime record. The value is null if the record is a definition record.

EndDateTime.description: The end date and time of the task.

IsDefinition.description: Indicated whether the record is a definition record.

IsMandatoryTask.description: Specifies whether the action is mandatory.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: The name of the omni assessment task record.

OmniProcessId.description: Represents the omni process record associated with the assessment task when it is executed.

OwnerId.description: ID of the omni assessment task record owner.

Sequence.description: The sequence in which the task can be performed.

StartDateTime.description: The start date and time of the task.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the task. You must define and update the values manually.

StatusCode.description: Specifies the current status of the task.

TaskRelationId.description: Represents the relation between an object associated with the action plan target record.

UniqueName.description: The unique name of the omni assessment task used in the Metadata API.
